## Results for package {{pkg}}

```{r res-{{pkg}}, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, results="asis"}
cat(sprintf("Package version used: %s\n\n", packageVersion("{{pkg}}")))
L <- testNonFinite("{{pkg}}")
nm <- paste0("{{pkg}}", "-dGPD2")
## print(names(L))
if (!is.null(L[["dGPD2"]])) {
    for (fn in c("d", "p", "q")) {
        nm <- paste0(fn, "GPD2")
        cat(sprintf("o Equivalent of '%s': '%s'\n",
                    nm, attr(L[[nm]], "name")))
        print(knitr::kable(L[[nm]]))
    }
}
if (!is.null(L[["dGEV"]])) {
    for (fn in c("d", "p", "q")) {
        nm <- paste0(fn, "GEV")
        cat(sprintf("o Equivalent of '%s': '%s'\n",
                    nm, attr(L[[nm]], "name")))
        print(knitr::kable(L[[nm]]))
    }
}
```
